mapper.insert: insert into neuedu_shipping (id, user_id, receiver_name, receiver_phone, receiver_province, recriver_city, revricer_district, receiver_address, receiver_zip, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receiverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recriverCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{revricerDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now())
mapper.update:
update neuedu_shipping set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, receiver_name = #{receiverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_phone = #{receiverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_province = #{receiverProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recriver_city = #{recriverCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, revricer_district = #{revricerDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_address = #{receiverAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_zip = #{receiverZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update neuedu_shipping
receiver_name = #{receiverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiver_phone = #{receiverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiver_province = #{receiverProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recriver_city = #{recriverCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

receiver_zip = #{receiverZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = now()
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, receiver_name, receiver_phone, receiver_province, recriver_city, revricer_district, receiver_address, receiver_zip, create_time, update_time from neuedu_shipping where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, user_id, receiver_name, receiver_phone, receiver_province, recriver_city, revricer_district, receiver_address, receiver_zip, create_time, update_time from neuedu_shipping where id = #{shippingId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and user_id=#{userId}

mapper.delete: delete from neuedu_shipping where id=#{shippingId} and user_id=#{userId}
